fields.name: Chicken Tikka
fields.description: Chicken Marinated in yoghurt and spices, cooked in a clay oven.

fields.description: On the bone lamb marinated in Zolshas pioneering dressing then grilled.

fields.name: Royal Mix
fields.description: A mixture of chicken tikka, onion bhaji & seekh kebab, lets you try all the classic starters

fields.name: Chicken Pakora
fields.description: Chicken strips marinated in a spiced yoghurt and deep fried in batter

fields.name: Meat Samosa
fields.description: Crispy homemade pastry triangles stuffed full with spiced minced meat & soft potato

fields.name: Chicken Chatt
fields.description: Small pieces of chicken cooked in a medium chaat massala sauce served with a pancake.

fields.name: Shami Kebab
fields.description: Lightly spiced minced meat and onion, moulded into a flat kebab & grilled.

fields.name: Onion Bhaji
fields.description: Thinly sliced onions, covered in a spicy flour & deep fried

fields.name: Vegetable Samosa
fields.description: Spiced vegetable in crispy homemade pastry & fried

fields.name: Paneer Tikka
fields.description: Lightly marinated cheese cubes, cooked over a charcoal grill, then glazed with a sweet and spicy dressing

fields.name: Kashmiri Chatt Puree
fields.description: Potatoes & chickpeas in a medium dry sauce served with a pancake.

fields.name: Garlic Mushrooms
fields.description: Fresh mushrooms cooked in mustard oil with cream, garlic, cheese and herbs. Served with garlic bread

fields.name: Fish Pakora
fields.description: Pieces of spiced fish coated in batter & deep fried.

fields.name: Fish Tikka
fields.description: A healthy appetiser of seasoned white fish barbequed in the tandoori oven.

fields.name: King Prawn Chatt
fields.description: King prawns gently cooked in a dry medium sauce, with a pancake.

fields.name: Garlic King Prawn
fields.description: Tiger prawns with sliced garlic, herbs & mustard oil then stir fried.

fields.name: Aromatic Chingri
fields.description: King prawns marinated with plum chutney, garlic & cinnamon then gently cooked with onions & peppers.

fields.name: BBQ King Prawns
fields.description: Tiger prawns marinated with herbs & spices, cooked over a charcoal grill to give a smoky BBQ flavour.

fields.name: Bhuna
fields.description: A delicious, medium dish with onion, tomatoes & spices

fields.name: Madras
fields.description: A South Indian dish, fiery & hot flavoured with lemon

fields.name: Dupiaza
fields.description: Onions seasoned with spices cooked until tender to produce a flavourful medium dish

fields.name: Karahi
fields.description: A unique blend of Zolshas spices creates a medium sauce with chunks of onion, tomatoes & chilli peppers

fields.name: Rogan Josh
fields.description: A preparation of pimento, garlic, onions & tomato

fields.name: Pathia
fields.description: A hot & sour saucy dish cooked with onions, chilli & black peppercorns

fields.name: Dansak
fields.description: Hot & Sour yet sweet - a combination of lentils & pineapple

fields.name: Desi Massala
fields.description: An Asian style saucy dish cooked with green chillies, bay leaves, cinnamon & garam massala

fields.name: Balti
fields.description: Highly spiced balti sauce cooked with fresh ingredients, mixed spices, onions & bullet chillies

fields.name: Vindaloo
fields.description: A very hot dish with lots of chillies, spices and cubes of potato

fields.name: Biryani
fields.description: Stir fried basmati rice flavoured with yakni, onions and fresh spices. Served with vegetable curry sauce.

fields.name: Jalfrezi
fields.description: Gently cooked spicy dry sauce with fresh ginger, garlic, onions, peppers and herbs

fields.name: Saag
fields.description: Spinach combined with herbs, spices & slices of fresh garlic creating a delicious dry dish

fields.name: Korma
fields.description: A very mild and creamy dish. Chicken or lamb cooked with coconut to give it a sweet flavour.

fields.name: Chicken Tikka Massala
fields.description: Marinated chicken in a rich massala sauce with ground almonds, coconut & cream.

fields.name: Makhani
fields.description: Chicken tikka in a mild sauce with pistachios, cream, spices & coriander.

fields.name: Zolsha Exotica
fields.description: Chicken in a sweet sauce of coconut, mango & pineapple. Topped with a cherry.

fields.name: Kaliya Gosht
fields.description: A combination of tender lamb and paneer, flavoured with star aniseed, cumin & black peppercorns in a traditional spicy sauce

fields.name: Mirchi Massala
fields.description: Marinated chicken cooked with potatoes and a unique mixture of spices, red & green chillies which gives this dish a fiery flavour. Topped with crispy potato slices.

fields.name: Rezzala
fields.description:
Marinated in yoghurt & chilli cooked in a South Indian sauce.
         Topped with fried red chilli and onions & lots of fresh coriander

fields.name: Royal Vensi
fields.description: Chicken tikka simmered in a cream, honey & mustard sauce topped with caramelised onions.

fields.name: Nani Ka Massala
fields.description: Breast chicken cooked with fresh garlic, plum tomato, red chilli & massala sauce. Very popular! Our grandmas original recipe

fields.name: South Indian Chicken
fields.description: Cooked in a specially prepared garlic sauce with fresh tomato & green chilli to give an authentic taste & texture. Elegantly crafted by our head chef.

fields.name: Zolsha Balti Massala
fields.description: A unique & complex dish. Marinated in herbs and spices then cooked in a rich massala sauce. One of our best-selling dishes.

fields.name: Minted Bhuna
fields.description: Cooked with methi leaves, tomato, fresh herbs, mint & spices.

fields.name: Naga Tarkaari
fields.description: A combination of marinated chicken and minced lamb cooked with the finest Indian spices & chefs special hot chilli paste.

fields.name: Garlic Chilli Chicken
fields.description: A famous dish from Delhi, this spicy dish is rich & full of flavour. Chicken cooked with plenty of fresh chillies then topped with tarka garlic.

fields.name: Moghal Chicken
fields.description: Favourite of Moghal Emperors. Off the bone tandoori chicken cooked in a tasty sauce with minced lamb & a medium massala.

fields.name: House Special Curry
fields.description: Traditional dish of Bangladesh. Highly spiced & cooked with mixed peppers, onion, coriander & olive oil.

fields.name: Lacknawi Karahi
fields.description: Medium strength sauce cooked with a special mixture of ground spices & fresh coriander. A North East Indian inspired dish garnished with onion, peppers & a dash of cream.

fields.name: Hyderabadi
fields.description: A rich dish cooked with tangy spices, yogurt, bay leaf, cloves & cardamom. It is full of mouth watering flavours.

fields.name: Chicken Handi
fields.description: Diced chicken cooked in a handi pot until tender with 9 key spices, ginger slices & lots of fresh coriander.

fields.name: Gosht Patta
fields.description: Tender lamb cooked in a medium sauce topped with roasted onions & cream then drizzled with honey.

fields.name: Chicken Zolshan
fields.descripion: Strips of chicken, peppers and onions cooked with plenty of ginger, spring onion and tomatoes to create a rich sauce.

fields.name: Tava Lahori
fields.description: Home-Style dish with green chilli, tomatoes and garam massala. A combination of small pieces of chicken tikka, keema and potatoes.

fields.name: Zolsha Kebab Cocktail
fields.description: Marinated pieces of chicken, lamb, king prawn and meatballs grilled with peppers & onions then slow cooked in a medium sauce.

fields.name: Chicken Chana Massala
fields.description: Chicken & chickpeas cooked with chillies, green pepper & chefs specially prepared sauce.

fields.name: Fish Anari
fields.description: Succulent pieces of coley fish with flavours of pomegranate, garlic, ginger & spices, garnished with lemon.

fields.name: Machli Salom
fields.description: Diced massala fish in a medium sauce with garlic, spring onion, green peppers, tomatoes and our own selection of spices.

fields.name: Fish Lazzadar
fields.description: Cooked with Zolshas homemade chilli sauce, lemon zest, parsley & lime. Bursting with refreshing flavour

fields.name: Salmon Piazi
fields.description: Gently marinated salmon served in a medium sauce with stir fried onions & peppers then drizzled with olive oil

fields.name: King Prawn Kuzuri
fields.description: Cinnamon, massala onions & mallasis give this adventurous creamy dish an extra special spicy flavour.

fields.name: Tandoori King Prawn Massala
fields.description: King prawns barbequed in the tandoori with a rich, creamy, coconut & almond sauce.

fields.name: Kofta Chingri
fields.description: Shallow fried spicy fish kofta laid on a bed of dhall massala with a hint of lemon. This delicious dish is topped with lightly spiced grilled king prawns

fields.name: Jinga Paneer Palack
fields.description: Tandoori King prawns and spicy coated paneer nestled on top of a saag bhaji base. Served with a sweet and spicy sauce.

fields.name: Garlic Chicken Korma
fields.description: Everyone's favourite mild dish, now with a spicy twist. Toasted garlic and onions give this creamy dish a smoky kick.

fields.name: Meat Marati
fields.description: This East Asian inspired dish combines ginger, chillies, lemongrass and coconut to create a spicy coating for the tender meat.

fields.name: Massaladar Murgh
fields.description: Gently cooked chicken smothered in a sweet and spicy sauce. One of Chef's special recipes - a must try dish. Served with toasted garlic, pepper & onions.

fields.name: Kali Mirch
fields.description: Chicken pieces tossed together with mustard oil and a spicy naga sauce with plenty of black pepper, lime and tomato.

fields.name: Zardani
fields.description:
Chicken cooked with a blend of light spices & almonds with a hint of sweet 
         yoghurt & massala sauce.

fields.name: Anarasi
fields.description: Slow cooked lamb combined with plenty of garlic, coriander & spices topped with stir fried pineapple.

fields.name: Peri Peri Chicken
fields.description: On the bone chicken marinated with herbs, red wine & spices. Served with rice,salad and drizzled with peri-peri sauce. A complete meal

fields.name: Chicken Shashlick
fields.description: Mildly spiced chicken skewers with tomatoes, capsicums & onions grilled BBQ style.

fields.name: Tandoori Mix Grill
fields.description: Marinated in spices & cooked in a clay oven to preserve the natural flavours. Tandoori chicken, lamb chops, chicken tikka, seekh kebab, fish & king prawns.

fields.name: King Prawn Shashlick
fields.description: Spiced king prawns skewered with tomatoes, capsicums and onions, grilled BBQ style.

fields.name: Fish Shashlick
fields.description: Spiced white fish cooked in the tandoori with tomatoes & onions then tossed in a spicy glaze.

fields.name: Tandoori Seabass
fields.description: Seabass fillet marinated in yoghurt, chillies, ginger & smoky paprika. Served with fried onions, peppers & fish curry sauce.

fields.description: With spices, egg and coriander

fields.description: Fresh vegetables, herbs & spices

fields.name: Special Rice
fields.description: Basmati rice with chicken tikka, egg & green peas

fields.name: Mushroom Pilau Rice
fields.description: Mushrooms, onions, coriander & spices

fields.name: Kashmiri Rice
fields.description: Basmati rice with dried fruit, coconut, onion & spices

fields.name: Garlic Rice
fields.description: Fried onions, garlic, coriander & spices

fields.description: Mince meat, onions, coriander & spices

fields.description: Spicy potatoes cooked in a dry sauce

fields.description: Indian cheese & spinach cooked with garlic and spices

fields.description: Chickpeas & spinach cooked with garlic & green chillies

fields.description: Lightly spiced potatoes cooked with steamed cauliflower

fields.description: Traditional home-style spicy lentil dish
